topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553f7e0a63687264b5141900#post_553f7e0a63687264b5141900
I'm sure I didn't even put an hour on this.

Sure, the work lasted longer than an hour but not an hour's worth of pure artistry. Usually, if I'm in the mood, I draw better and in shorter time.

I just wasn't in the mood.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
!http://cdn.meme.am/instances/57400777.jpg!

So, I just thought of a funny scenario if I never will get my driver's license.

I was a political leader of the world and one day, I got late to somewhere. When they asked why, I told them I didn't have a driver's license so I had to take a cab. And then, people started to overreact like they always do, wondering if I deserve my place as a political leader since I don't have a license to drive.

I couldn't imagine what would happen next though.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
